A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The customary \"shoot 'em up\" scene between the Millennium Falcon and a squadron of TIE fighters is an insulting attempt to distract viewers from a story riddled with too many sub-plots\, lame humour\, and 21st century feminist politics that relegate the male characters to little more than hormonal\, morally-compromised\, mumbling\, stumbling buffoons.\nHow far the Star Wars canon continues to drift from the blockbuster epics that comprise the original trilogy.
